description: You are more able to draw upon inspiration than most.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Amateur Investigator or inspiration class feature.

sections.text: You gain three extra use per day of inspiration in your inspiration pool.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: If you have levels in the investigator class, you can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain three extra uses of inspiration per day.
sections.name: Special

prerequisites: Amateur Investigator or inspiration class feature
name: Extra Inspiration
